name: personalcodingsuite
description: A bunch of tools to help personalize the code you write

commands.title: Update Personal Header only if it is already in the file

personalCodingSuite.personalHeader.heade.markdownDescription:
What should the Header look like.  
You can use some predefined variables:  
	`<date>` : replaced with the date of the header  
	`<filename>` : replaced with the filename

personalCodingSuite.personalHeader.colum.markdownDescription: How many columns should the header be forced of size

personalCodingSuite.personalHeader.textA.markdownDescription: Determine the vertical alignment of both the `Header Text` and `Ascii Art`

personalCodingSuite.personalHeader.textP.markdownDescription: Determine how many spaces are put on either side of the `Header Text` and/or `Ascii Art`

personalCodingSuite.personalHeader.dateF.markdownDescription: When `<date>` is used in the header text, it is replaced with this string

personalCodingSuite.personalHeader.ascii.description: This will be put on the right side of personal headers

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
